Description: Mechanical engineering design - Valve Design Drawing Set
Notes: Valve arrangement drawings and actuator details for ~220 valves; includes CAD production; 1000 hours @ $155/hr blended rate per A-1613 and A-1614

Description: Mechanical engineering design - Valve Technical Specification
Notes: Three procurement specifications (control valve; isolation valve; relief valve); materials and performance requirements; 500 hours @ $155/hr per A-1613 and A-1614

Description: Mechanical engineering design - Valve Design Calculations
Notes: Control valve sizing (Cv calculations); relief valve sizing (API 520/521); actuator sizing; 750 hours @ $155/hr per A-1613 and A-1614

Description: Mechanical engineering design - Valve Data Sheet Package
Notes: Individual valve datasheets for ~220 valves (control; isolation; relief; strainers; specialty); 1150 hours @ $155/hr (avg 5 hrs per datasheet) per A-1613 and A-1614

Description: Control valves with pneumatic actuators and positioners
Notes: 30 control valves (flow; pressure; level control) including pneumatic actuators; smart positioners; accessories; stainless steel 316SS; DN50-DN200 range per A-1602; unit cost per A-1606; includes positioners per A-1622

92 manual isolation valves (block service; maintenance isolation); stainless steel 316SS; handwheel operated; DN50-DN300 range per A-1602; unit cost per A-1606; 68% of isolation valves manual per A-1604

36 pneumatic automated isolation valves (ESD service; seasonal operation); stainless steel 316SS; includes pneumatic actuators; limit switches; DN50-DN200 range per A-1602 and A-1604; unit cost per A-1606

22 electric motor-operated valves (large isolation; tank isolation); stainless steel 316SS; includes motor operators; limit switches; DN150-DN300 range per A-1602 and A-1604; hazardous area rated per A-1639; unit cost per A-1606 and A-1626

20 pressure relief valves (tank relief; pump relief; thermal relief); API 526 flanged steel PRVs; stainless steel; ASME stamped; DN25-DN150 range per A-1602; includes set pressure FAT per A-1624; unit cost per A-1606
20 strainers (pump suction protection; meter protection); Y-type or basket style; stainless steel 316SS; DN50-DN200 range per A-1610; unit cost per A-1606
20 check valves (backflow prevention; pump discharge; gravity feed protection); swing or wafer style; stainless steel 316SS; DN50-DN300 range per A-1611; unit cost per A-1606
Control valve installation (rigging; bolting; alignment; pneumatic hookup; positioner calibration; stroking test); avg 8 hrs per valve @ $95/hr all-in rate per A-1607 and A-1612
Manual isolation valve installation (rigging; bolting; gasket installation; alignment; hydrostatic test support); avg 6 hrs per valve @ $95/hr per A-1607 and A-1620

Pneumatic automated isolation valve installation (valve installation 6 hrs + pneumatic hookup 3 hrs per A-1621); avg 9 hrs per valve @ $95/hr; includes air tubing; air set; limit switch wiring; leak check; stroking test per A-1620 and A-1621

Electric motor-operated valve installation (valve installation 8 hrs + electrical hookup 4 hrs per A-1621); avg 12 hrs per valve @ $95/hr; includes conduit/cable; terminations; motor test; limit switch wiring; stroking test per A-1620 and A-1621

Relief valve installation (rigging; bolting; alignment; discharge piping interface; field verification per A-1630); avg 5 hrs per valve @ $95/hr per A-1607 and A-1620; set pressure FAT by vendor (included in valve cost per A-1624)
Strainer installation (rigging; bolting; alignment; blowdown piping; access platform if required); avg 4 hrs per valve @ $95/hr per A-1607 and A-1620
Check valve installation (rigging; bolting; orientation verification; flow direction marking); avg 3 hrs per valve @ $95/hr per A-1607 and A-1620
Torque wrenches; hydrostatic test pump; valve repair tools; stroking test equipment; calibration tools per A-1633
CI = 0.18 × CD ($165k); includes field supervision; QA/QC; HSE; site overhead; temporary facilities per fallback typical model and D-1608
P = 0.02 × MAT ($1678k); includes vendor sourcing; PO processing; expediting; receiving inspection; material documentation; valve vendor coordination per fallback typical model and D-1608

PM = 0.06 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($1873k); includes project management; engineering management; cost/schedule control; contract administration; stakeholder coordination per fallback typical model and D-1608

COM = 0.03 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($1873k); includes pre-commissioning; valve stroking and functional testing per DEL-16.05; control loop checks per A-1629; relief valve field verification per A-1630; system acceptance; handover per fallback typical model and D-1608
